sentence: "Todays 4-4 Supreme Court ruling has blocked one of the most unconstitutional actions ever undertaken by a President
The executive amnesty from President Obama wiped away the immigration rules written by Congress giving work permits and entitlement benefits to people illegally in the country
This split decision also makes clear what is at stake in November
The election and the Supreme Court appointments that come with it will decide whether or not we have a border and hence a country
